Package org.apache.taverna.wsdl.parser

Contains classes required to parse a WSDL to discover and describe the operations and their input and output data structures.
These classes are derived heavily from the original parsing classes from the Taverna 1 WSDLBasedProcessor and have been refactored
to remove references to to Taverna 1

See: Description

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    GenericWSDLParser  
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    ArrayTypeDescriptor
    A TypeDescriptor that specifically describes an array type
    AttributeTypeDescriptor
    A TypeDescriptor specifically for attributes.
    BaseTypeDescriptor
    A TypeDescriptor specifically for basic types (e.g.
    ComplexTypeDescriptor
    A TypeDescriptor that specifically describes a complex type
    LSInputImpl  
    SchemaResolver
    Schema Resolver that resolves schemas for various APIs at a time (SAX, DOM and Apache XML Schema 2.0) It also used for keeping a List of DOM Elements defined in WSDL Types.
    TypeDescriptor
    Base class for all descriptors for type
    TypeDescriptors
    An utility class to construct WSDL type descriptors based on XML Schema.
    WSDL11Parser
    This is an WSDL 1.1 / Xml Schema 1.0 parser based on WSDL4j and Apache XML Schema 2.0 libraries
    WSDL20Parser  
    WSDLParser
    A Parser for processing WSDL files to determine information about available services and the required types needed to invoke that particular service.
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    WSRF_RLOperation  
    WSRF_RPOperation  
    WSRF_Version  
  • Exception Summary 
    Exception Description
    UnknownOperationException
    Exception thrown when a given service operation name cannot be found for that WSDL

Package org.apache.taverna.wsdl.parser Description

Contains classes required to parse a WSDL to discover and describe the operations and their input and output data structures.
These classes are derived heavily from the original parsing classes from the Taverna 1 WSDLBasedProcessor and have been refactored
to remove references to to Taverna 1
